sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_log_entity_update ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32) not null, opid int not null, valname varchar(32) not null, fromval varchar(128), toval varchar(128), userid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, ip varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_entity_delete ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32), tblname varchar(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, ip varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_download ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32) not null, filesize bigint not null, filetype varchar(16), userid char(32), createdate timestamp not null, ip varchar(32) not null, lastupdate timestamp, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );
create table sf_log_login ( id char(32) not null, userid char(32), createdate timestamp not null, logoutdate timestamp, ip varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_pv_stat ( id char(32) not null, lyear int not null, lmonth smallint not null, lday smallint not null, lhour smallint not null, pv int not null, uv int not null, ip int not null, averagetime int not null, mintime int not null, maxtime int not null, primary key(id) );
